QueryViewSpec.Name: AddBatchNumberToPostToGL Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Adds the Batch number to the Post to GL.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select GLTRANSACTION.ID as GLTRANSACTIONID, GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT as ACCOUNTSTRING, GLTRANSACTION.POSTDATE as POSTDATE, 'R' as TRANTYPE, case GLTRANSACTION.TRANSACTIONTYPECODE when 0 then 'D' else 'C' end as DEBITCREDIT, GLTRANSACTION.AMOUNT, GLTRANSACTION.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT, GLTRANSACTION.ORGANIZATIONAMOUNT, case when REVENUEGLDISTRIBUTION.OUTDATED = 0 then REVENUE.BATCHNUMBER else reverseRevenue.BATCHNUMBER end as BATCHNUMBER from dbo.GLTRANSACTION left join REVENUEGLDISTRIBUTION on GLTRANSACTION.ID = REVENUEGLDISTRIBUTION.GLTRANSACTIONID left join dbo.REVENUEGLDISTRIBUTION reversed on reversed.GLTRANSACTIONID = GLTRANSACTION.REVERSEDGLTRANSACTIONID and reversed.OUTDATED = 1 left join REVENUE reverseRevenue on reverseRevenue.ID = reversed.REVENUEID left join REVENUE on REVENUEGLDISTRIBUTION.REVENUEID = REVENUE.ID
